Text:
Only from you, God our Father,
	does redemption find us, your adopted children.
Look with favor upon your family that you love,
	give true freedom to us, and to all who believe in Christ,
	and journey with us until we reach our eternal home in your kingdom.
Through our Lord Jesus Christ, your Son,
who lives and reigns with you in unity of the Holy Spirit,
one God, forever and ever.
Amen.
